com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.emitter

Class Emitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.emitter.Emitter

  • public final class Emitter
extends Object
    Responsible for sending an event (Broadcastable) to registered listeners.

      Sends an event to registered subscribers of the given event type (i.e., class), including any subscribers to types within the event's class hierarchy.

        public Emitter()

    • Method Detail

      • phase

        public void phase(SubscriptionPhase phase)
        Sets the current SubscriptionPhase. This determines which registered subscribers receive broadcasts.
        Parameters:
        phase - The current phase.

      • phase

        public SubscriptionPhase phase()
        Gets the current SubscriptionPhase.
        Returns:
        The current SubscriptionPhase.

      • register

        public void register(Object subscriber)
        Registers an instance of an object to receive broadcasted events (usually a Plugin instance).

        The methods on the class of the object will be scanned for applicable annotations (e.g., Rework, Validate). The methods will be invoked when the matching event is broadcasted in the applicable phase.

        Parameters:
        subscriber - Register this object to receive events.

      • emit

        public void emit(Broadcastable event,
                 Grammar grammar,
                 Broadcaster broadcaster,
                 ErrorManager em)
        Sends an event to registered subscribers of the given event type (i.e., class), including any subscribers to types within the event's class hierarchy.

        "Event" here refers to an instance of a Broadcastable.

        Parameters:
        event - The event instance.
        grammar - The Grammar instance.
        broadcaster - The Broadcaster that refiners should use.
        em - The ErrorManager instance.
